subject: Re: Bed Linen, Homewares + Accessories

full_threads.body:
Hi Amy,

Late!? Hahaha.

And no it shouldn’t stuff up quoting. I’ll double/triple check though.

Thanks!!
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300 072 134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415 162 271>
Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>

<https://wpperk.com/>

> On 15 Apr 2021, at 6:20 pm, Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>> wrote:
>
> ﻿Yes that is fine. Will it stuff up quoting?
>
> Sorry you’re working late too! Feel free to reply tomorrow.
>
> Kind Regards
> Amy Smith

> AMY SMITH
> CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

>>
>> Ok great. Agreed. I’ll source some pics. In time, can you let me know if the categories can be minimise as noted in my previous email….i.e
>>
>> Bedroom Furniture
>> Armchair / Occasional Chair
>> Bedside Table
>> Beds
>> Bed ensemble – single
>> Bed ensemble – double
>> Bed ensemble – double split base
>> Bed ensemble – queen
>> Bed ensemble – queen split base
>> Bed ensemble – king
>> Dining / Desk Chair
>> Headboards
>> Double Headboard
>> Queen Headboard
>> King Headboard
>> As that will help us to work out what styled pics we need to find.
>>
>> Thank you!
>>
>> Kind Regards
>> Amy Smith

>>> On 15 Apr 2021, at 4:59 pm, Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au <mailto:amy@huntleyandco.com.au>> wrote:
>>>
>>> Hey,
>>>
>>> Me again!!
>>>
>>> We are head wrecking a bit internally on how to best display these pages. To date we have shown a line drawing but have had feedback from external people that it’s a bit confusing. I see we have a few options:
>>> Leave as is with line drawings
>>> Change the icon to a styled image and when you click the product (which previously you couldn’t do) it explains how the showroom works as has a carousel of styled pics (see top line of attached)
>>> Have 4 x small deepetch images of a products but this looks messy to me (see botttom line of attached)
>>>
>>> Keen to get your thoughts as to what would provide the best UX (look at me all tech savvy 😉) and best explain our somewhat confusing system to select accessories.
>>>
>>> Kind Regards
>>> Amy Smith
>>>
>>> AMY SMITH
>>> CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR
